---
title: "Daily Monitor"
output:
  beamer_presentation: default
  slidy_presentation: default
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(Rblpapi)

blpConnect()

getData <- function(Ticker){
  bdh(Ticker, c("PX_LAST"), start.date = Sys.Date()-365)
}

ggTS <- function(Ticker, Title = Ticker){
  data <- getData(Ticker = Ticker)

  ggplot2::ggplot(data, ggplot2::aes(x = date, y = PX_LAST)) +
    ggplot2::geom_line() +
    ggplot2::geom_point(colour = "blue") +
    ggplot2::labs(title = Ticker, y = "Price", x = "Date")

}
```


#UK

## GBPUSD

```{r GBPUSD}
g1 <- ggTS("GBPUSD Curncy")
g2 <- ggTS("GBPEUR Curncy")
grid.arrange(g1, g2, nrow = 2)

```

## UK Yields

```{r UK_yields}
uk_2y <- ggTS("GTGBP2Y Govt")
uk_5y <- ggTS("GTGBP5Y Govt")
uk_10y <- ggTS("GTGBP10Y Govt")
uk_30y <- ggTS("GTGBP30Y Govt")
grid.arrange(uk_2y, uk_5y, uk_10y, uk_30y, nrow = 2)
```
